verses.verseString: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verses.verseStringReplacedWithAllah: In the name of Allah, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: Didn’t We soothe your heart for you?
And We removed from you your burden.
That weighed heavily on your back.
And We raised high for you your reputation.
Certainly, with difficulty, there is relief.
Once you have completed your tasks, turn to devotion.
And to your Lord direct your longing.
